features.title: Advanced Dual Multiport Valve System with Intelligent InterlockingThe Hybrid I-75 features two dedicated multiport valves to independently manage the Carbon & Sand Filter and the Water Softener
features.desc: . This dual system is specifically designed to handle high turbidity levels in water, allowing frequent backwashing of the Carbon and Sand filters without affecting the softener cycle. Both MPVs are engineered with high-durability ceramic moving and fixed discs and can operate under pressure with minimal maintenance. The integrated Purity Hub Interlocking System ensures that only one unit undergoes backwashing or regeneration at a time—each valve checks the status of the other before initiating its cleaning cycle, guaranteeing optimal water availability.Hybrid I-

features.title: Integrated Equipment for Cost & Maintenance EfficiencyBoth MPVs (for filter and softener) share core components like vacuum breakers
features.desc: , pressure gauges, electronic ball valves, and a single regeneration/backwash motor. This unified system significantly reduces installation costs and long-term maintenance needs.  –    –           ,

features.title: Complete Water WorkstationEffectively removes dust
features.desc: , mud, odor, and water hardness. This all-in-one unit can be upgraded anytime, making it a future-ready water treatment solution.Hybrid I-

features.title: Time & Volume-Based Backwash and RegenerationCustomizable cleaning cycles based on water usage or preset time intervals
features.desc: , providing adaptability across different use cases.               ()

features.title: High Flow Rate
Inbuilt Patented Low Salt Alarm SystemOur proprietary sensor technology alerts users automatically when brine salt is low
features.desc: , ensuring uninterrupted softening and timely salt refills.               ,
